I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
Hq: 0 < q
r: nat
Hr: r = power q 2
Hr': 2 <= r
n: nat
e: nat -> nat
g: nat -> nat
f: nat -> nat
Hf: forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r
Hg: forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r
He: forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j

Goal:
sum_powers r n f e ≲ sum_powers r n g e <-> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ g i)

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation sum_powers := (fun r n f e => ∑ n (fun i => f i * power (e i) r))
Tauto.FF : Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]

VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
binary_le_joins_inv : forall (m n : nat) f, m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 k g /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i

```coq
intros. split.
- intros H. apply sum_powers_bound with (e := e) in H; auto.
  rewrite <- sum_powers_ortho in H; auto.
  apply binary_le_joins_inv in H. destruct H as [k [g [h [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]].
  exists k. exists g. exists h. repeat split; auto.
- intros [k [g [h [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]].
  apply power_decomp_unique with (p := r) (n := k) (f := e) (a := g) (b := f); auto.
  apply power_decomp_lt; auto.
Qed.

original: intros. split. - intros H. apply sum_powers_bound with (e := e) in H; auto. rewrite <- sum_powers_ortho in H; auto. apply binary_le_joins_inv in H. destruct H as [k [g [h [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]]. exists k. exists g. exists h. repeat split; auto. - intros [k [g [h [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]]. apply power_decomp_unique with (p := r) (n := k) (f := e) (a := g) (b := f); auto. apply power_decomp_lt; auto.
